tooltip.castle_in_the_sky.levitation_sto: This stone leads you to *Castle in the Sky*.
Trade with a cartographer for the item.
advancements.castle_in_the_sky.get_levit: Get a levitation stone by trading with a Cartographer.
advancements.castle_in_the_sky.find_cast: Find *Castle in the Sky* by following the levitation stone.
